attributes.action: Total withdrawl of all British / Nato forces from all occupied Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown, I believe your Government and the opposition have breached International law since the British Government signed the Kellog-Brion Pact which only permits member states / Governments too defend its citizens and borders against invasion.AND forbids invasions. IF NATO figures on fatalities are correct nearly 500,000 civilians[including woman and children] have been murdered by UN forces in Iraq and Afghanistan, we are breaking International war laws ,and every moral law against our fellow humans in these acts of Genocide I hold you and all your associates guilty of Genocide and demand you withdraw our forces NOW
